components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to MPT Network

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Myanmar - MPT Network. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Myanmar - MPT Network. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Myanmar - MPT Network. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Myanmar - MPT Network. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Myanmar - MPT Network. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Myanmar - MPT Network. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delay to all networks in Brazil over a subset of shortcodes and Pre-registered senderID

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS to all networks in Brazil over a subset of shortcodes and Pre-registered senderID, but intermittent delays could occur. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery in SMS to all networks in Brazil over a subset of shortcodes and Pre-registered senderID. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS Delivery Delay to all networks in Brazil over a subset of shortcodes and Pre-registered senderID. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We Continue experiencing SMS Delivery Delay to all networks in Brazil over a subset of shortcodes and Pre-registered senderID. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS Delivery Delay to all networks in Brazil over a subset of shortcodes and Pre-registered senderID. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS Delivery Delay to all networks in Brazil over a subset of shortcodes and Pre-registered senderID. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently facing delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 7 days until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with A2P 10DLC campaign reviews, facing delays due to high volume. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have additional information.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 February 2023 at 13:00 PST until 09 February 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Yoigo network in Spain is conducting a Planned maintenance from 10 February 2023 at 15:00 PST until 10 February 2023 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Yoigo Spain handsets.

The Beeline Network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance From 11 February 2023 at 11:00 PST until 11 February 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window. There could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline handsets.

The Megafon Network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance From 11 February 2023 at 11:00 PST until 11 February 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window. There could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: New Zealand SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in New Zealand is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 February 2023 at 13:00 PST until 12 February 2023 at 13:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from New Zealand handsets via a subset of Shortcode.

The Beeline Network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance From 14 February 2023 at 06:00 PST until 14 February 2023 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window. There could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline handsets.

The T-Mobile Network in Austria is conducting a planned maintenance From 14 February 2023 at 09:00 PST until 14 February 2023 at 10:30 PST. During the maintenance window. There could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile handsets.

Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 February 2023 at 13:00 PST until 14 February 2023 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US Verizon handsets via Short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Service Partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 February 2023 at 23:00 PST until 23 February 2023 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada.

Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Identity Match

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 27 February 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 01 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
06 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 06 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
08 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 08 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
13 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 13 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
